notice.ch: 學習所博一、二／碩一、二預選

department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 學習所博一、二／碩一、二預選

goal.ch: 本課程旨在培養學生對不同教育相關議題與趨勢的掌握能力，本學期課程邀請多位講師蒞臨演講，目的在於增進學術交流之風氣，讓學生以不同的學術角度進行批判與思考，在研究上能有更廣闊的心胸。
goal.en: This course aims to cultivate students’ ability to grasp various educational issues and trends. Throughout the semester, guest speakers will be invited to give lectures to enhance the academic exchange atmosphere. The goal is to encourage students to critically analyze and contemplate from different academic perspectives, fostering a broader mindset for research.

gradMethod.en:
Grading Criteria:

1.Attendance: 15％
2.Class Participation and Engagement: 50％
3.Final Written Report: 35％

*Scores will be assessed separately by two instructors and combined at the end of the semester.

ch: 系所:限學習與教學研究所碩士班、學習與教學研究所博士班。年級:限一年級、二年級。
en: Department:Graduate Institute of Learning & Instruction、Graduate Institute of Learning & Instruction only.Year:First Year、Second Year only.
